name: nameday
description: Tell us when to celebrate your thrice-fold name day! it defaults to the day you joined the server.

options.name: date
options.description: the "[month]/[day]" of when your nameday is

options.name: target
options.description: see when this person's name day is. Admins can use both date and target to set someone's nameday

options.name: opt-out
options.description: set to true to opt-out of nameday announcements, set to false to opt-in
